titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to authorize the designation of additional taxable vaccines.
Vaccine Access Improvement Act of 2018
Vaccine Access Improvement Act of 2018
Vaccine Access Improvement Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Vaccine Access Improvement Act of 2018
This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to the excise tax on specified vaccines, to allow the Department of Health and Human Services to designate additional taxable vaccines.
